EmailTemplate.subject: Next steps for your award
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.ACDF_FName__c},
It’s been a pleasure working with you! Thank you for taking the time to determine the best ways to increase the impact of your Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award.
Here's what you can look forward to next:
Invoice: You will receive an invoice for the items you purchased by the next business day following your order.
Submitting profile materials: You will receive an email within the next week with instructions on how to submit your profile text and photo.
Marketing tools: Marketing tools are delivered by the 15th of the magazine publication month.
The best part of my job is working with great people like you, and I’m excited to see the results of our efforts. As always, please feel free to contact me with any questions. Thank you for your time and partnership throughout the process!
